description.raw:
This adds <collide_bitmask> support to bullet.

There was some code that looked like an attempt to add support that was never completed. This pull request keeps a limitation from this old code: BulletLink adds all collisions on a Link to the same btRigidBody and uses the bitmask of the first collision. I cannot find a way to remove this limitation without breaking ABI.

Future work could remove this limitation by having BulletLink create a btRigidBody for every collision and join them together with fixed constraints. Then every collision could have it's own mask.
